reviews.name: accounts/109616517437403268640/locations/5135673551050654657/reviews/Ci9DQUlRQUNvZENodHljRjlvT2pSclZHbEhOa3BtWTJoeVRHdEZhbE5CWkZGb1NWRRAB

reviews.comment:
The staff at Cocoon Medical were amazing in answering all my concerns. They kept regular contact over a couple of days as I considered the treatments available. I was so nervous getting injectables in Bali at a place I hadn‚Äôt been before. Miranda was so patient and reassuring and answered all my questions on WhatsApp.

I was in Bali for my daughter‚Äôs wedding and wanted to top up my filler but I was worried about bruising as the wedding was only 4 days after the appointment.

On the day I met my Doctor Dr. Eva.
Dr. Eva patiently listened to my concerns and advised me by explaining detailed descriptions of what she was prescribing and why. I was made to feel so comfortable with numbing cream, all products and instruments were presented in sealed sterile packaging and were opened in front of me in a sterile room. Every precaution was taken so much so that I have never experienced this level of safety and safe protocols in Australia. All administering injectors in this clinic are qualified doctors.

Dr Eva was so gentle and while she didn‚Äôt promise I wouldn‚Äôt bruise I never had a mark on the area treated for the day. I had filler topped up in the right side of my face which was slightly more hallowed that the left side due to a car accident I‚Äôd had years ago.

I had never been suggested the injection site that Dr Eva suggested before by injectors in Australia, but I was so happy with the results. It was truly an approach that worked, to balance out my face. I spent just under $400AUD for 1 mil of filler.

I can‚Äôt recommend Cocoon Medical Clinic enough. If you are in Bali and want to get a top up it‚Äôs the perfect place to visit with total confidence. I am extremely happy with the results from my treatment with Dr Eva and I will be booking ahead of time on my next Bali trip because this place will soon be everyone‚Äôs priority destination visit.

reviewReply.comment:
Hi Tanya,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience in such detail. We are truly honored by your trust and so pleased to know that you felt comfortable, safe, and well cared for throughout your journey with us.

We understand how important it is to feel confident‚Äîespecially when preparing for such a special occasion like your daughter‚Äôs wedding‚Äîand we‚Äôre thrilled that Dr. Eva and our team were able to meet your expectations. Your kind words about our safety protocols, communication, and results mean the world to us.

Dr. Eva, Miranda, and the entire Cocoon team deeply appreciate your recognition and are grateful to have been part of your Bali experience. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit!

Regards,
Cocoon Team
